I want to ensure my interview skills are sharp for the volume of interviews ahead.
feedbackStyle: I prefer structured feedback that highlights specific areas for improvement, perhaps with examples of how I could have responded better. Pointing out both strengths and weaknesses is helpful, especially if it relates to career growth.
